Class ShopPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ShopPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Refreshable

    public class ShopPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Refreshable
    Instances of ShopPanel are components of Game objects. They contain all components associated with the in-game shop, and are shown when the player enters the shop.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addContentPanel()
      Adds the main content panel and all its components to the ShopPanel.
      private void addHealingItemMenuPanel()
      Creates a panel for the healing item menu, containing an icon and button for each healing item, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout.
      private void addHealingItemPanel(HealingItem healingItem)
      Creates a information panel for the given healing item, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout, using the String representation of the healing item.
      private void addInventoryPanel()
      Creates a panel showing the team's current inventory, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout.
      private void addMapPanel()
      Creates an information panel for a map, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout.
      private void addPowerUpMenuPanel()
      Creates a panel for the power up menu, containing an icon and button for each power up, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout.
      private void addPowerUpPanel(PowerUp powerUp)
      Creates a information panel for the given power up, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout, using the String representation of the power up.
      private void addSidePanel()
      Adds the side panel and all its components to the ShopPanel.
      private void addSubPanels()
      Adds all the panels and their components to the contentPanelCardLayout.
      private void addTitle()
      Adds the Shop title label to the top of the ShopPanel.
      void refresh()
      Refreshes the panel by updating all dynamic components.
      private Team team()
      Returns the Team object associated with this panel's Game.

      • gameWindow

        private Game gameWindow
        The main Game window that this panel is a part of. Used by event handlers to change the panel shown in game.

      • contentPanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel contentPanel
        The main content panel in the ShopPanel. Has a CardLayout to contain a panel for each shop item, and an inventory panel.

      • contentPanelCardLayout

        private java.awt.CardLayout contentPanelCardLayout
        The CardLayout of the content panel.

      • sidePanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel sidePanel
        The side panel of the ShopPanel. Displays the team's current money, and has buttons to allow the user to select a shop item to view, view the inventory, or exit the shop.

      • lblCurrentCoinsAmount

        private javax.swing.JLabel lblCurrentCoinsAmount
        A JLabel showing the number of coins the team currently has. Should be updated when the ShopPanel is refreshed.
